attributes.action: address the effectiveness of the jobcentre plus and look at the effectiveness of supervision of junior staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they obviously don't read their paperwork properly and haven't a clue about individual cases. It is not the responsibility of those charged in their job description with getting people back to work to judge if someone is capably ready for work, but the GP : medical trained and qualified practitioners. The petitioner is requesting formal documentation  legally that I have voiced my concern to you about advisors shouting at me on the phone and treatening prosecution if I don't attend apointments, when my GP has said I should be in bed.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
